text.div:
WHO Extended Codes CodeSystem codes

Set of codes identified as being needed but not found in existing Code Systems

This code system http://who.int/cg/CodeSystem/extended-content-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Makes noise during sex Makes noise during sexIssues and concerns - Makes noise during sex
Other OtherIssues and concerns - Other
Difficulty persuading partner to use method Difficulty persuading partner to use methodIssues and concerns - Difficulty persuading partner to use method

Minor surgery without immobilization Minor surgery without immobilizationMinor surgery without immobilization
Diabetes >20 years duration Diabetes >20 years durationDiabetes >20 years duration
Other vascular disease >20 years duration Other vascular disease >20 years durationOther vascular disease >20 years duration
Cigarettes smoked per day Cigarettes smoked per dayCigarettes smoked per day
<15 cigarettes per day <15 cigarettes per daySmoking category - <15 cigarettes per day
>= 15 cigarettes per day >= 15 cigarettes per daySmoking category - >= 15 cigarettes per day
Complicated Valvular heart disease Complicated Valvular heart diseaseComplicated Valvular heart disease
Uncomplicated Valvular heart disease Uncomplicated Valvular heart diseaseUncomplicated Valvular heart disease
Tuberculosis - Non-pelvic Tuberculosis - Non-pelvicTuberculosis - Non-pelvic
Broad-spectrum antibiotics Broad-spectrum antibioticsMedications - Broad-spectrum antibiotics
Other OtherType of backup method provided - Other
Backup Method Needed Backup contraception method neededBackup contraception method needed
